website_summaries.verdict: A fabric swinging hammock for indoor use designed to help kids calm down and focus.
pros: Designed for sensory processing issues, attention issues, and autism
The pressure and enclosure help create a feeling of security
cons: The swing has a weight limit and may be hard for some people to get into

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning.
customer_reviews.text: This is for the Quility Indoor Hammock -77lbs. Its WAAAYYY too small for my 7year old. The fabric is super stretchy but simply not big enough for her to comfortably lay in it.
customer_reviews.author: Carly P

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this swing. We hung it in his room and he uses it all the time. He has some sensory/emotional issues and this really calms him when he feels overwhelmed. He can go get in it and calm himself down much faster than before we had it. The fabric seems really strong and washed well in the washer. I hung it up to dry and it was just as soft as before we washed it. I’ve hung it several different ways and it works well no matter how you set it up. I’m very pleased with this swing and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ansley Newby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast even during the COVID-19 outbreak. Just what we needed for our 6 year old who is struggling without school and needs a place to “chill out” Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Furnari

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this swing. He had one at his OT's office and we suggested us to get one at home. It is a great space for him to go and just chill.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly E.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!  Quality product and beneficial for sensory kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice fabric, extremely beneficial for my sensory kiddo! We hung in the basement and she loves it, wants to swing in it daily and it really stabilized her (she has SPD.). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: s benj

customer_reviews.title: What a great comapny and product
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It came as described and works great. My 16 month baby loves reading, swing and falling asleep in the this product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Be sure and wash the swing before use. I washed and hung to dry. It had a chemical smell and color rubbed off on my grandaughter. The swing did not come with screw to attach to ceiling. Am happy with the product, good quality. Granddaughter loves the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Neuenschwander

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fun
customer_reviews.text: This snuggle swing is excellent fun by itself. It offers a snug cocoon around the child and the fabric distributes the pressure evenly. If it is paired with a swing spinner it is possible to swing and spin in all directions.
customer_reviews.author: AlesO

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 9 yr old daughter who is adhd/sensory on the recommendation of her O.T. She loves it for both relaxtion and also more active, rambunctious play. It’s also a consistent hit with friends who come over. It’s easy to unclip from the ceiling when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lanman

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kids with SPD
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this swing and he can use it in different ways ! If only the ropes are slightly longer as it's high for my son to use it by himself
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Farjallah

customer_reviews.title: Quality material and quality service.
customer_reviews.text: The swing was packaged with care. The quality of the materials did not disappoint. My kids love it and it performs just as I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.author: J

product_meta.title: Quility Indoor Hammock Swing - Therapy Swing for Kids with Special Needs - Lycra Snuggle Swing - Cuddle Hammock Chair for Children with Autism, ADHD, Aspergers - Ideal for Sensory Integration
feature_bullets: EXTRA DURABLE. EXTRA FUN. This cuddle swing is 4-way stretch fabric (80% polyester, 20% lycra), making it soft to touch, yet durable and long lasting. This means that your child can sit, lay down, and swing in it for hours without the fear of the fabric giving out.

A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY SPECIAL NEEDS CHILD. Swaddling gives children a sense of protection and blocks out unnecessary sensory input. This swing is a must for children who have a Sensory Processing Disorder (SPD), Asperger’s Syndrome, ADHD, or those on the autism spectrum. Recommended for ages 3+.

AMAZING THERAPEUTIC BENEFITS. The swinging motion strengthens the vestibular and proprioceptive systems by teaching your child’s brain and body to work together. This sensory integration greatly improves your child’s coordination, balance, body awareness, and concentration.

TRUSTED BY OCCUPATIONAL THERAPISTS. Our children’s sensory swing is frequently recommended by occupational therapists and autistic schools. The swing therapy strengthens head, neck and core muscles which improves physical activities such as walking and running.

EASY INSTALLATION INDOORS & OUTDOORS. NO HOOK INCLUDED. Set-up can be completed in under 5 minutes, and the instruction booklet makes installation a no-brainer. This hammock swing can be mounted indoors as well as to an outdoor porch, swing set, or tree. The fabric is machine washable and can be air dried.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars356 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
